title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Mobile Device-Based Science Learning Resource Integration Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theory comprehension, ability to use basic smartphone functions
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze data collected in the field using a science experiment simulation app
Learners can build a knowledge-sharing system with peers using collaborative tools across mobile devices
Learners can develop strategies to effectively integrate scientific learning resources even in limited technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
